tool_description: Performs comprehensive statistical analysis of calibration measurement data including standard deviations, confidence intervals, and distribution assessments.

measurement_data.description: Raw measurement data arrays for each calibration point

reference_values.description: Corresponding reference standard values in millimeters

outlier_detection.description: Enable statistical outlier detection and removal

error_messages: Insufficient data: Need at least 15 data points for meaningful statistical analysis.
Data array mismatch: measurement_data and reference_values must have compatible dimensions.
Invalid confidence level: Use 0.9, 0.95, or 0.99 for confidence_level.
Statistical analysis failed: Data does not meet requirements for normal distribution analysis.
usage: Provide measurement data arrays and reference values. Tool performs comprehensive statistical analysis with outlier detection and confidence interval calculation.

mean_errors.description: Mean errors for each calibration point in micrometers

standard_deviations.description: Standard deviations for each point in micrometers

outliers_detected.description: Number of outlier data points identified and removed
